definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: of time, now (prop. acc. of [ïint], [[עֵת]] (Kö:ii. 260), at the time, in partic. of the present time, i.e. now; cf. Germ. zur Zeit, Ar. 0’al0a0na at the time, i.e. now);—now:

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: Ge 12:19 [[ועתה הנה אשׁתך]] and now, behold thy wife, Ge 22:12 [[כי עתח ידעתי]] now, I know (so Ex 18:11, Ju Jdg 17:13, 1Ki 17:24 [[[עַתָּה זֶה]]], Ps 20:7), Ge 26:22, Ge 26:29, Ge 27:36, Ge 31:13, Ge 31:28, etc., Ex 5:5 [[הך רביס עתה עס הארץ]]; whether in opp. to past time, as Ge 32:11, Jos 14:11 [[כְּכׂחִי]] [[אָז וּכְכׂחִי עָָתָּה]], Ju Jdg 11:8, 1Ki 12:4, Is 1:21 [[ועתה מרחחים]], Is 16:14, Ho 2:9 [[כִּי טוֹב לִי אָז מַעָָתָּה]], Ho 13:2, Job 30:1 +, or to future, as Nu 24:17 [[אֶרְאֶנּוּ ולא עתה]], Ju Jdg 8:6 [[חֲכַף]] [[עַתָּה־כְּיׇדְֶָ]] ´[[זֶבַח וח]], 1Sa 2:16 [[כִּי עַתָּה תִּתֵּן]]; = after all Nu 22:38, Ju Jdg 8:2; = now at last 2Sa 24:16, 1Ki 19:4, 2Ki 19:25, Ho 7:2, Je 4:12; and in the phr. [[מעתה]] [[ועד עולם]] † Is 9:6, Is 59:21, Mic 4:7 (v. infr.), Ps 113:2, Ps 115:18, Ps 121:8, Ps 125:2, Ps 131:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of the imminent or impending future: Ge 19:9 [[עַתָּה נׇרַע לְ ְמַהֶם]]. Ge 29:32 [[כי עתה יאהבני אישׁי]], v:Ge 29:34, Ex 6:1 [[עתה תראה]], Nu 11:23, Nu 22:4, 2Sa 20:6, Is 33:10 (Ps 12:6), Is 43:19, Is 49:19, Am 6:7 [[לכן]] [[עתה יִגְלוּ]], Is 49:19, Mic 7:4, Mic 7:10, Da 10:20; and esp. a)sunde/twv in Hos, introducing a punishment, Ho 4:16 ´[[וגו]] ´[[עתה יִרְעֵם י]] Ho 5:7, Ho 8:8, Ho 8:13 (Je 14:10), Ho 10:2.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of a time ideally present (= then, from our point of view): Is 29:22 [[לא עתה יבושׁ יעקב]], v:b, Ho 10:3, Mic 4:9, Mic 4:10, Mic 4:11, Mic 4:14, Mic 5:3.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: describing a present state = as things are: 1Sa 8:5 thou art old, etc., [[עתה]] [[שִׂימָה לנו מלך]], 1Sa 9:6, 1Sa 13:12, 1Sa 14:30, 1Sa 25:7 b, 1Sa 27:1 now I shall be swept away one day, etc., 2Ki 18:20, 2Ki 18:25, Job 6:21, Job 14:16, Job 16:7.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: with an Imv., as an encouragement, implying that the time has come for the exhortation or advice to be followed, Ge 31:13 [[עתה קים חא]], Ex 18:19 [[עתה שְׁמַע בקולי]], Nu 22:11, De 2:13, Is 30:8.
